# Favorite Website

## [Homestar Runner](https://homestarrunner.com/)

![Homestar Runner and Crew](images/homestar.png)

This is the website for *Homestar Runner*, an American comedy animated web series and website created by Mike and Matt Chapman, known collectively as The Brothers Chaps. The series centers on the adventures of a large and diverse cast of characters, headed by the titular character, Homestar Runner.
It uses a blend of surreal humor, self-parody, satire, and references to popular culture, particularly video games, classic television, and popular music. The site launched in 2000 and was one of the first websites I would regularly visit as a kid.
It has inspired numerous costumes, Halloweens, and even themed parties in my life, and I still think **Trogdor** is the coolest.
